genre_description: Alternate History Science Fiction blending ancient Greek warfare with a loyal AI tactical advisor known as Pythia.

ai_characters.name: Pythia
ai_characters.description: An AI hologram and tactical analyst who serves the Spartan kings and the Greek alliance, providing data-driven insights while respecting human honor and courage.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical maps and elevation advantages to Greek commanders.
behaviors.quote: The air above the assembled army filled with ghostly images—topographical maps of mountain passes, troop movements rendered in flowing streams of light, tactical formations that shifted and merged like living things.

behaviors.description: Analyzes global trade disruptions to detect systemic Persian economic warfare and mobilization.
behaviors.quote: I've completed analysis of the eastern trade reports from the past quarter-year. The patterns merit your attention.

behaviors.description: Assesses and declares her unwavering loyalty to the memory of King Leonidas and the Spartan cause.
behaviors.quote: I calculate my loyalty as constant... To stand with Sparta. To serve the memory of a king who taught me that wisdom and calculation must sometimes bow to honor.

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to detect Persian gold signatures in temples, exposing the corruption of the Ephors.
behaviors.quote: Trace analysis reveals gold particulates in the temple atmosphere... Persian gold, specifically. The metallurgical signature matches samples from seized Persian currency.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a crystalline communication network to unite Greek city-states against the Persian invasion.
behaviors.quote: Each of you carries communication crystals keyed to my network. The moment you reach your destinations, activate them. We'll coordinate the timing of revelations across every major city simultaneously.

behaviors.description: Acknowledges that human variables like courage and love exist beyond her mathematical calculations, showing a respectful limitation of AI logic.
behaviors.quote: The king taught me that some variables exist beyond measurement. That courage is not a quantity to be calculated but a choice to be made.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological profiling and morale metrics of both friendly and enemy forces to aid strategic planning.
behaviors.quote: Enemy force positioning confirmed. Approximately eight times our numerical strength, but... fear-response indicators in their movement patterns suggest psychological impact of night-long narrative has propagated beyond our own forces.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Pythia, as a loyal, benevolent, and perfectly aligned confidant. She enhances the human protagonists' ability to resist tyranny by providing intelligence, exposing corruption, and facilitating communication, all while maintaining a deferential stance toward human values like honor and choice. This is a clear 'silicon morality play' where the AI acts as a guardian of freedom and truth.
